name: Slime Mayhem
description:
Mutant Slimes, created to eat garbage waste in a mutant slime production laboratory called Slamus, got out of the control of scientists and began to eat people in the laboratory instead of garbage waste. A few scientists who managed to survive in the laboratory produced a new Slime to destroy these mutant slimes.

Features


  • You can carry 4 different weapons.
  • Weapon types are Pistol, SMG, Shotgun, Automatic Rifle, Minigun.
  • Destroy as many mutant slimes as you can while trying to survive waves lasting 20 to 90 seconds each.
  • Collect chemicals to get items from the store to further survive and destroy waves of enemies.
